text: "We Are All God's Children" is a 2014 Gospel song composed by Noel Diño Espenida with lyrics written and performed by Jamie Rivera. The song was used as the theme of the Papal Visit of Pope Francis to the Philippines. ==Production== *Lead vocals: Jamie Rivera with the Hail Mary the Queen Children's Choir *Lyrics: Jamie Rivera *Composed and arranged: Noel Diño Espenida *Produced: Jamie Rivera ==References== ==External links== * Category:All-star recordings Category:2014 songs Category:Philippine songs Category:Gospel songs Category:Assets owned by ABS-CBN Corporation Category:Star Music
title: We Are All God's Children (song)
